title: kalilO hari
sahitya:
kalilO hari caraNamokaTiyE gAka itara mArgam mari lEdayyA



anupallavi



palumAru janana maraNa vyAdulabaDi jaTakanu mAnavulArA I



caraNam



dAra tanayAdi bAndhavulu shatamani encakanE tArumAruna phaNatula mOhamu

harikEshapuramuna velayu suravaranuta karuNAkaruni jara
